member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Extender
member.summary: An Extender module for Microsoft .NET Gadgeteer.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Extender.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.param: The mainboard socket that has the module plugged into it.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Extender.CreateDigitalInput(Gadgeteer.Socket.Pin,Gadgeteer.SocketInterfaces.GlitchFilterMode,Gadgeteer.SocketInterfaces.ResistorMode)
member.summary: Creates a digital input on the given pin.
member.param: The pin to create the interface on.
The glitch filter mode for the interface.
The resistor mode for the interface.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Extender.CreateDigitalOutput(Gadgeteer.Socket.Pin,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a digital output on the given pin.
member.param: The pin to create the interface on.
The initial state for the interface.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Extender.CreateDigitalIO(Gadgeteer.Socket.Pin,System.Boolean,Gadgeteer.SocketInterfaces.GlitchFilterMode,Gadgeteer.SocketInterfaces.ResistorMode)
member.summary: Creates a digital input/output on the given pin.
member.param: The pin to create the interface on.
The initial state for the interface.
The glitch filter mode for the interface.
The resistor mode for the interface.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Extender.CreateInterruptInput(Gadgeteer.Socket.Pin,Gadgeteer.SocketInterfaces.GlitchFilterMode,Gadgeteer.SocketInterfaces.ResistorMode,Gadgeteer.SocketInterfaces.InterruptMode)
member.summary: Creates an interrupt input on the given pin.
member.param: The pin to create the interface on.
The glitch filter mode for the interface.
The resistor mode for the interface.
The interrupt mode for the interface.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Extender.CreateAnalogInput(Gadgeteer.Socket.Pin)
member.summary: Creates an analog input on the given pin.
member.param: The pin to create the interface on.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Extender.CreateAnalogOutput(Gadgeteer.Socket.Pin)
member.summary: Creates an analog output on the given pin.
member.param: The pin to create the interface on.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Extender.CreatePwmOutput(Gadgeteer.Socket.Pin)
member.summary: Creates a pwm output on the given pin.
member.param: The pin to create the interface on.

member.name: P:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Extender.ExtenderSocketB
